summary: A former thief is released from a prison. He tries to start a new life with his penfriend - a good village woman, but his past doesn't let him go.
cast: Lidiya Fedoseeva-Shukshina|Vasiliy Shukshin|Ivan Ryzhov|Mariya Skvortsova|Aleksey Vanin|Mariya Vinogradova|Olga Bystrova|Lev Durov|Nikolay Grabbe|Georgiy Burkov|Iya Arepina|Tatyana Gavrilova|Anatoli Gorbenko|Natalya Gvozdikova|Vadim Kondratev|Aleksandr Konyashin|Oleg Korchikov|Vladimir Laptev|Artur Makarov|Nikolay Pogodin|Zhanna Prokhorenko|Aleksandr Sarantsev|Tatyana Ukharova|Evgeniy Zharov|Valentina Ananina|Aleksey Bakhar|Natalya Krachkovskaya|Anna Meshcheryakova|Margarita Zharova
title: Kalina krasnaya
